description:
This time Rod Daily is joining up with a couple friends, Cody Cummings and Parker London. Both of these dudes are experienced young men who appreciate the skill of a talented cock sucker. That's why Rod is so warmly welcomed to this little party. He jumps in with the passion of a cum-hungry banshee!

Parker is an old skool ass licker from way back. Watch him take his time with Cody's tasty hole, making sure to run his tongue over every bit of it. And I bet you've never seen Cody with a dick in his mouth. Well...you just MIGHT this time!

Enjoy!
series: R038 - Rod Daily, Cody Cummings & Parker London
title: It's A Triple Play!
